xml:
Gestone<tm tmtype="reg"/> solution for injection Indications and dose

Dysfunctional uterine bleeding

By deep intramuscular injection

  • Adult

    5–10 mg daily for 5–10 days until 2 days before expected onset of menstruation, to be administered into buttocks.

Recurrent miscarriage due to inadequate luteal phase (but not recommended) or following in vitro fertilisation or gamete intra-fallopian transfer

By deep intramuscular injection

  • Adult

    25–100 mg 2–7 times a week from day 15, or day of embryo or gamete transfer, until 8–16 weeks of pregnancy, to be administered into buttocks; maximum 200 mg per day.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
